name: Royal Ludo Clash King
description:
Want to clash with your friends? Dive into Royal Ludo Clash King, the action packed Ludo Game. 

Ludo game traces its line back to 6th century India. Ludo is derived from the game Ludo parchisi. Ludo games is also very similar to Spanish board game called Parchis game.

Royal Ludo Clash King is a royal battle version of very popular classic board game Ludo. This Royal Ludo Board Game is called royal game because it is a clash between kings on the battle field.

We comes with the royal look of Ludo Board Game called Royal Ludo Clash King with single player to 4 player. Now Ludo can be enjoyed by you and your family and friends by playing it together.

Features :

- Royal flavour of classic Ludo game.
- Interesting gameplay rules.
- Options to play with computer or local multiplayer. 
- Easy user interface and interactive sounds.


How to play :

- The game includes players as per your selection.
- Each player have 4 tokens, player have to take full turn of board to make it to finish line.
- Whoever gets all 4 tokens to the finish line first is the winner.

Royal Ludo Clash King Rules :

- Roll the dice to play. Set the pre-condition 2,4,6 or 5,6 or only 6. Once you get pre-condition, the character will come out in battlefield from the base.
- If you roll a 6, you can get a chance to roll dice one more time.
- There is no room for defence. Only way to win is Attack!

Play and have a good time with “Royal Ludo Clash King” Game.
